_header: It is law that faileth not
_description: An anagram on L. O. V. E. — four lines

BLHar7322.Transcription:
Hit is lawe þat failleþ nothHit is ouer al þat mai beo
                    wrouȝthHit werkeþ wonderlicheAnd ernes ȝeueþ
                    sikerliche
BLHar7322.Note:
Preceded by ‘L.O.V.E’, with rubricated capital strokes
                    through each letter.
